headline: Investing.com’s stocks of the week
summary: Investing.com -- It’s been a mixed week for U.S. stocks, but the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, currently down on a weekly basis, have made gains on Friday to close the gap.

raw.headline: Investing.com’s stocks of the week
raw.summary: Investing.com -- It’s been a mixed week for U.S. stocks, but the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, currently down on a weekly basis, have made gains on Friday to close the gap.

headline: Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) Is Down 20.4% After Mud Rush Halts Grasberg Mine and Triggers Force Majeure
summary: Earlier this month, Freeport-McMoRan announced a tragic mud rush at its Grasberg Block Cave mine in Indonesia, resulting in fatalities, missing workers, and a suspension of mining operations, alongside the declaration of force majeure on copper shipments and downward revisions to sales guidance. This unprecedented operational disruption at one of the world's largest copper mines is impacting global copper supply expectations and highlights the operational risks associated with concentrated...
